sources.title: Gun Grit
sources.description: When things get hot for them in the city, gang boss Mack (Roger Williams) takes his men west to run their protection racket scheme. The FBI sends Bob Blake (Jack Perrin) to investigate and he finds trouble on the Hess ranch. Touring the ranch he finds the gangsters shooting cattle. He trails them to their hideout only to be caught and made a prisoner.

sources.title: Gun Grit (1935) - Jack Perrin
sources.description: Gun_Grit_1935 - Jack Perrin Big city gangster muscle in on ranch territory with a cattle protection racket. Out to stop them is federal agent Jack Perrin.

sources.title: Gun Grit (1936) JACK PERRIN
sources.description:
Stars: Jack Perrin, Ethel Beck, David Sharpe 
Director: Lester Williams

After  big city gangsters muscle in on ranch territory with a cattle protection racket, a federal agent sets out to stop them.

metadata.Plot: When things get hot for them in the city, gang boss Mack takes his men west to run their protection racket scheme. The FBI sends Bob Blake to investigate and he finds trouble on the Hess ranch. Touring the ranch he finds the gangsters shooting cattle. He trails them to their hideout only to be caught and made a prisoner.
metadata.Writer: Gordon Phillips, Lewis Kingdon, Allen Hall
metadata.Actors: Jack Perrin, Ethel Beck, David Sharpe
